com.github.nsc.de.shake.lexer.characterinput.position

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nsc.de.shake.lexer.characterinput.position.Position
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PositionMarker

    public class Position
extends Object
implements PositionMarker
    The Position marks a position in the source-code.
    Author:
    Nicolas Schmidt <@nsc-de>
